excerpt: "INDIANAPOLIS â€” An Indiana man honored health care workers battling the coronavirus by painting a nearly quarter-acre-sized American flag on his property. It took Justin Riggins and a crew of helpers two hours to prepare the area and about five hours to apply the 30 gallons of paint for the 10,686-square-foot flag, WTHR reported."
